x_293397_web_cli_command_scripts.description: Display Number and Short Descriptions for Incidents containing SAP in the Description
x_293397_web_cli_command_scripts.name: select-sap
x_293397_web_cli_command_scripts.script: print ******* BEGIN SAP Related records select number,short_description from incident where descriptionCONTAINSSAP print ******* END SAP Related records
